mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outsourcing_contract_details ( ocd_cd, mbr_cd, ent_cd, cl_cd, ocd_ttl, ocd_expln, ocd_frctn_cmdty, ocd_dlvgds_mthd, ocd_strt_ymdt, ocd_dedline, ocd_amt, ocd_dmnd_ymdt, ocd_req_type, stc_cd ) VALUES ( #{ocd_cd}, #{mbr_cd}, #{ent_cd}, #{cl_cd}, #{ocd_ttl}, #{ocd_expln}, #{ocd_frctn_cmdty}, #{ocd_dlvgds_mthd}, #{ocd_strt_ymdt}, #{ocd_dedline}, #{ocd_amt}, NOW(), #{ocd_req_type}, 'SD_BEFORE' )
mapper.update: UPDATE outsourcing_contract_details SET chr_cd = #{chr_cd} WHERE ocd_cd = #{ocd_cd}
UPDATE outsourcing_contract_details SET stc_cd=#{status}, ocd_rspns_ymdt=NOW() WHERE ocd_cd=#{requestId}
mapper.select: SELECT ocd.ocd_cd, ocd.ocd_ttl, e.ent_nm AS supplierName, ocd.ocd_dmnd_ymdt, ocd.stc_cd, m.mbr_nm AS demanderName FROM outsourcing_contract_details ocd JOIN enterprise e ON ocd.ent_cd = e.ent_cd JOIN member m ON ocd.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd WHERE ocd.mbr_cd = #{requesterId} AND ocd.ocd_req_type = '신청' ORDER BY ocd.ocd_dmnd_ymdt DESC

SELECT ocd.*, m.mbr_nm as demanderName, e.ent_nm as supplierName FROM outsourcing_contract_details ocd JOIN member m ON ocd.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd JOIN enterprise e ON ocd.ent_cd = e.ent_cd WHERE ocd.ocd_cd = #{requestId}
SELECT ocd_cd FROM outsourcing_contract_details WHERE ocd_cd LIKE 'OCD_C%' ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(ocd_cd, 6) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ocd.ocd_cd, ocd.ocd_ttl, m.mbr_nm AS demanderName, e.ent_nm AS supplierName, ocd.ocd_dmnd_ymdt, ocd.stc_cd FROM outsourcing_contract_details ocd JOIN member m ON ocd.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd JOIN enterprise e ON ocd.ent_cd = e.ent_cd WHERE ocd.ent_cd = #{supplierEntCd} AND ocd.ocd_req_type = '신청' ORDER BY ocd.ocd_dmnd_ymdt DESC
SELECT ent_cd FROM enterprise WHERE mbr_cd=#{mbrCd}
SELECT osp_cd FROM outsourcing_prograss ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(osp_cd, 5) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outsourcing_prograss (osp_cd, ocd_cd, stc_cd, osp_sply_ymdt) VALUES (#{ospCd}, #{ocdCd}, #{stcCd}, NOW())
